title: Honor Not Increasing
body:
So since honor restarted, I have been playing as much as I can and have been getting honored and haven't increased at all. 

What is wrong? Do you need to get like 3 honor a game or something?

replies.body: Nah man remember last season? it's basically the same and it's only been a month

it's slower this season since you need more honour points to progress because last season everyone was honour 5 in like 1-2 months, regardless of toxicity. So honour reqs have been amped up, but still easily achievable by midseason considering how many honour 3-4 we have already.
I think it was set up for it being harder to achieve
Yeah mines the same. Mine has states im pass the lasr check point, but that was ages ago...
